author: Special Correspondent
text:
Assistance under various welfare schemes to the tune of Rs. 9.72 lakh was distributed to 76 differently abled beneficiaries at a function organised at S. H. N. Boys Higher Secondary School, Sattur, by the Revenue Minister, R. B. Udhaya Kumar, on Tuesday.

Speaking on the occasion, Mr. Udhaya Kumar said that the Chief Minister, Jayalalithaa, had instructed that preference should be given to differently abled people while choosing beneficiaries under various government schemes.

Those who participated in the function included Pugazhendi, Chief Educational Officer, and Kanagaraj, Differently Abled Welfare Officer.
title: Differently abled persons given aid
